description:
A feature-rich ski jacket built to perform and protect on and off the slopes.
A waterproof-breathable shell and insulated, thermal-reflective lining keep wet out and warmth in.
Mountain-ready details include ski pass and goggle pockets, underarm vents, and adjustable hood, cuffs, hem, and powder skirt.
name: Columbia Sportswear Iceline Ridge Jacket - Mens
